name: 李育奇
objective:
本課程期望學生能夠能有獨立思考的能力，對產品建構出合理的實驗設計架構，透過採集人的生理與心理數據對產品進行人因工程評估，最後將實驗發現應用於產品的重新設計上，讓產品能夠更符合使用者的需求與認知。
In this course, students are expected to demonstrate independent thinking, develop a reasonable experimental design, conduct ergonomics evaluations on products by collecting both physiological and psychological data, and ultimately apply the findings to redesign products. This ensures that the products align more effectively with the needs and perceptions of users.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Introduction to Ergonomics
Week 3: Introduction to Physiological Human Factors I
Week 4: Introduction to Physiological Human Factors II
Week 5: Introduction to Cognitive Human Factors I
Week 6: Introduction to Cognitive Human Factors II
Week 7: Introduction to Environmental Human Factors I
Week 8: Introduction to Environmental Human Factors II
Week 9: Midterm Presentation
Week 10: Final Project Discussion - Introduction (Part I)
Week 11: Final Project Discussion - Introduction (Part II)
Week 12: Experiment Discussion - Methods (Part I)
Week 13: Experiment Discussion - Methods (Part II)
Week 14: Data Collection and Analysis (Part I)
Week 15: Data Collection and Analysis (Part II)
Week 16: Discussion and Application in Product Design
Week 17: Final Presentation I
Week 18: Final Presentation II
scorePolicy:
Homework: 20 %
Midterm report: 30%
Participation: 10%
Final presentation: 40%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）
